casebody.data:
BROOKS
v.
NC COURT OF APPEALS, et al. No. 323P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 29, 2006.

Roy Hall, Jr., Pfafftown, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 16th day of June 2006 by Defendant for "Notice of Appeal":

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 29th day of June 2006."
